title: All Audio Converter
description:
Description
===========
All Converter is a utility for converting between various aufio format.
Suppose your mobile phone supports only, mp3 format and not wav or wma, then you have to convert it to mp3 before transferring ti=o the phone.
All Converter will help you do it.


All Converter is a powerful, all-in-one, multimedia application. Features include:

o Professional Audio conversions among the most popular music formats
o Playback of the most popular music formats 
o Interface is fairly attractive. 
o Easy to use
o Support converting in batches 
o different conversion in one batch
o Support playing in batches. 
o Normalize files in batches.
o Convert ID3 tag v1,v2 and file name
o And much more!
o All Converter supports the most popular multimedia formats for playback, including 
- MPEG Layer-3 (MP3)
- MPEG Layer-2 (MP2)
- OGG Vorbis (OGG)
- Windows Media Audio (WMA)
- Windows Audio (WAV)
- VQF Files
- You can drag and drop selected Audio files into the window of All Converter and these selected songs can be added to the conversion list automatically.
